AT.name: The Quiet Collection
AT.description: Klassische, unbeschwerte Abenteuer-Spiel, Spaß! Benutze deinen Verstand und ein bisschen Unfug zu erforschen, zu interagieren mit Ihrer Umgebung und löse Rätsel in diesem Bündel von vier alten Schule Abenteuerspiele:"Quiet, Please!", "Quiet Christmas", "Vacation Vexation" and "Candy, Please!". Quiet, Please! Nach einem nervigen Tag in der Schule, Sie wollen einfach nur etwas Ruhe und Frieden. Aber alles, was zu Hause ist so laut! Dad ist Zappen, Mom ist auf dem Telefon und dem lästigen kleinen Bruder nicht ins Bett gehen! Quiet Christmas Es ist Heiligabend und Sie wollen einfach nur ins Bett gehen und aufwachen am Weihnachtsmorgen. Aber der Baum ist kaputt, das Haus ist zu kalt, klebrig Weihnachtsanzeige Mr. Peabody ist ärgerlich und wie immer dein Bruder nicht ins Bett gehen. Vacation Vexation Ah, die Familie Urlaub am Meer. Sonne, Sand und ... Ärgernisse in Hülle und Fülle. Entdecken Sie, lösen Sie Rätsel und spielen Sie Arcade-Mini-Spiele. Candy, Please! Es ist Halloween - eine Zeit, sich zu verkleiden, schnitzen Kürbisse und sammeln glorreichen Mengen von Süßigkeiten. Lassen Sie nichts zurück, Sie davon ab, Ihren gerechten Anteil!

AU.name: The Quiet Collection
AU.description: Classic, lighthearted adventure game fun! Use your wits and a bit of mischief to explore, interact with your environment and solve puzzles in this bundle of four old-school adventure games: "Quiet, Please!", "Quiet Christmas", "Vacation Vexation" and "Candy, Please!". Quiet, Please! After an annoying day at school, you just want some peace and quiet. But everything at home is so noisy! Dad is channel surfing, Mom is on the phone and your pesky kid brother won't go to bed! Quiet Christmas It's Christmas Eve and you just want to go to bed and wake up on Christmas morning. But the tree is broken, the house is too cold, Mr. Peabody's tacky Xmas display is annoying and as always your brother won't go to bed. Vacation Vexation Ah, the family seaside vacation. Sun, sand and... annoyances galore. Explore, solve puzzles and play arcade mini-games. Candy, Please! It's Halloween - a time to dress up, carve pumpkins and amass glorious amounts of candy. Let nothing stop you from getting your fair share!

Sun, sand and... annoyances galore. Explore, solve puzzles and play arcade mini-games. Candy, Please! It's Halloween - a time to dress up, carve pumpkins and amass glorious amounts of candy. Let nothing stop you from getting your fair share!

BE.name: The Quiet Collection
BE.description: Classique, léger plaisir de jeu d'aventure! Explorez, interagir avec votre environnement et résoudre des énigmes dans ce pack de quatre jeux d'aventure old-school: Quiet, Please! Après une journée ennuyeuse à l'école, vous voulez juste un peu de paix et de calme. Mais tout à la maison est tellement bruyant! Papa est zapping, maman est au téléphone et votre petit frère ne sera pas aller au lit! Quiet Christmas Il est la veille de Noël et vous voulez juste pour aller au lit et se réveiller le matin de Noël. Mais l'arbre est cassé, la maison est trop froid et, comme toujours ton frère ne sera pas aller au lit. Vacation Vexation Ah, les vacances en bord de mer de la famille. Soleil, sable et... ennuis à gogo. Explorez, résoudre des énigmes et jouez à des mini-jeux d'arcade. Candy, Please! Il est l'Halloween - un temps pour habiller, découper les citrouilles et amasser des montants glorieuses de bonbons. Que rien ne vous empêche de faire votre juste part!

ES.name: The Quiet Collection
ES.description: ¡Clásico, alegre divertido juego de aventuras! Explorar, interactuar con su entorno y resolver puzzles en este paquete de cuatro juegos de aventuras de la vieja escuela: "Quiet, Please!", "Quiet Christmas", "Vacation Vexation" and "Candy, Please!". Quiet, Please! Después de un día molesto en la escuela, lo que desea es un poco de paz y tranquilidad. ¡Pero todo en casa es tan ruidoso! Papá es el canal de navegación, mamá está en el teléfono y su hermano pequeño molestos ¡no se irá a la cama! Quiet Christmas Es Nochebuena y sólo quiero ir a la cama y despertar en la mañana de Navidad. Pero el árbol se rompe, la casa es demasiado frío y, como siempre tu hermano no va a ir a la cama. Vacation Vexation Ah, las vacaciones de playa familiar. Sol, arena y ... molestias en abundancia. Explorar, resolver puzzles y jugar mini-juegos de arcade. Candy, Please! Es Halloween - un tiempo para vestirse, tallar calabazas y acumular cantidades gloriosos de caramelos. ¡Que nada te detenga de conseguir su parte justa!

IT.name: The Quiet Collection
IT.description: Classic, avventura spensierato gioco divertente! Usa il tuo ingegno e un po 'di malizia da esplorare, interagire con l'ambiente e risolvere enigmi in questo fascio di quattro giochi di avventura vecchia scuola: "Quiet, Please!", "Quiet Christmas", "Vacation Vexation" and "Candy, Please!". Quiet, Please! Dopo una giornata fastidioso a scuola, si vuole solo un po 'di pace e tranquillità. Ma tutto a casa è così rumoroso! Papà è zapping, la mamma è al telefono e il vostro fratello minore fastidiosi non andrà a letto! Quiet Christmas E 'la vigilia di Natale e si vuole solo andare a letto e svegliarsi la mattina di Natale. Ma l'albero è rotto, la casa è troppo freddo, il display di natale di cattivo gusto del signor Peabody è fastidioso e come sempre il tuo fratello non andrà a letto. Vacation Vexation Ah, la vacanza al mare in famiglia. Sole, sabbia e ... fastidi a bizzeffe. Esplora, risolvere enigmi e mini-giochi arcade. Candy, Please! E 'Halloween - un tempo di vestirsi, ritagliarsi zucche e accumulare quantità gloriosi di caramelle. Non lasciare nulla ti impedisce di ottenere la vostra giusta quota!

NL.name: The Quiet Collection
NL.description: Classic, luchthartige adventure game plezier! Gebruik je verstand en een beetje kattenkwaad om te verkennen, te communiceren met uw omgeving en puzzels op te lossen in deze bundel van vier old-school adventure games: "Quiet, Please!", "Quiet Christmas", "Vacation Vexation" and "Candy, Please!". Quiet, Please! Na een vervelende dag op school, je wil gewoon wat rust en stilte. Maar alles in huis is zo luidruchtig! Vader is zappen, mam is op de telefoon en je vervelende broertje zal niet naar bed! Quiet Christmas Het is kerstavond en je wil gewoon naar bed gaan en wakker op kerstochtend. Maar de boom is gebroken, het huis is te koud, smakeloos Xmas vertoning Mr. Peabody is vervelend en zoals altijd je broer zal niet naar bed. Vacation Vexation Ah, de familie vakantie aan zee. Zon, zand en ... ergernissen in overvloed. Verkennen, puzzels oplossen en speel arcade mini-games. Candy, Please! Het is Halloween - een tijd om te kleden, carve pompoenen en vergaren glorieuze hoeveelheden snoep. Laat niets u tegenhouden van het krijgen van uw eerlijk aandeel!

Let nothing stop you from getting your fair share!

PL.name: The Quiet Collection
PL.description: Classic, lighthearted adventure game fun! Use your wits and a bit of mischief to explore, interact with your environment and solve puzzles in this bundle of four old-school adventure games: "Quiet, Please!", "Quiet Christmas", "Vacation Vexation" and "Candy, Please!". Quiet, Please! After an annoying day at school, you just want some peace and quiet. But everything at home is so noisy! Dad is channel surfing, Mom is on the phone and your pesky kid brother won't go to bed! Quiet Christmas It's Christmas Eve and you just want to go to bed and wake up on Christmas morning. But the tree is broken, the house is too cold, Mr. Peabody's tacky Xmas display is annoying and as always your brother won't go to bed. Vacation Vexation Ah, the family seaside vacation. Sun, sand and... annoyances galore. Explore, solve puzzles and play arcade mini-games. Candy, Please! It's Halloween - a time to dress up, carve pumpkins and amass glorious amounts of candy. Let nothing stop you from getting your fair share!

PT.name: The Quiet Collection
PT.description: Clássico, divertido jogo de aventura alegre! Use sua inteligência e um pouco de malícia para explorar, interagir com seu ambiente e resolver quebra-cabeças neste pacote de quatro old-school jogos de aventura:: "Quiet, Please!", "Quiet Christmas", "Vacation Vexation" and "Candy, Please!". Quiet, Please! Depois de um dia chato na escola, você só quer um pouco de paz e tranquilidade. Mas tudo em casa é muito barulhento! Pai é canal surf, mãe está no telefone e seu irmão mais novo traquinas não vai para a cama! Quiet Christmas É véspera de Natal e você só quer ir para a cama e acordar na manhã de Natal. Mas a árvore é quebrada, a casa é muito frio, exposição Xmas brega do Sr. Peabody é irritante e como sempre o seu irmão não vai para a cama. Vacation Vexation Ah, as férias à beira-mar da família. Sol, praia e... aborrecimentos abundância. Explorar, resolver enigmas e jogar mini-jogos de arcade. Candy, Please! É Halloween - um tempo de vestir-se, esculpir abóboras e acumular gloriosas quantidades de doces. Que nada impedi-lo de obter o seu quinhão!

RU.name: The Quiet Collection
RU.description: Классический, беззаботный приключенческая игра весело! Используйте свой ум и немного озорства, чтобы исследовать, взаимодействовать с окружающей средой и решать головоломки в этой связке из четырех старой школы приключенческих игр: "Quiet, Please!", "Quiet Christmas", "Vacation Vexation" and "Candy, Please!". Quiet, Please! После досадной день в школе, вы просто хотите тишины и покоя. Но все в доме так шумно! Папа канал серфинг, мама по телефону и ваш надоедливых младший брат не будет ложиться! Quiet Christmas Это Рождество, и вы просто хотите, чтобы пойти спать и просыпаться утром на Рождество. Но дерево сломан, дом слишком холодно, липкий дисплей г Пибоди Рождество раздражает и, как всегда твой брат не будет ложиться спать. Vacation Vexation Ах, семья курортный пляжный отдых. Солнце, песок и ... неприятности изобилии. Исследуйте, решать головоломки и играть в аркадные мини-игры. Candy, Please! Это Хэллоуин - время, чтобы одеваться, вырезать тыквы и накопить славные количество конфет. Пусть ничто не остановит вас от получения вашу долю!
